overview: Glass is a serial technology entrepreneur, having founded or held senior positions at four venture-backed technology companies. He is currently the CEO of Bizo, a B2B advertising network that spun out of ZoomInfo. While at ZoomInfo, a business information search engine, Russ lead the marketing and product management teams, where he sharpened his B2B marketing skill-set and developed his love for business data. Other than business data, Russ’s passions include golf, anything in high def, and Duke basketball.
